variable.name: geno
variable.description: Equals one if subject appears in genotype files

variable.name: genrel_0108
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0108 allows distribution to both non-profit and private entities, zero otherwise

variable.name: genrel_0407
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0407 allowed distribution to both non-profit and private entities, zero otherwise

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Refers to the Framingham cohort the sample comes from, useful to identify which files phenotypes will be found
variable.value: spouses of first offspring recruits, aka NOS

variable.name: itwin
variable.description: Used to designate IDENTICAL individuals within families. The pairs within families have the same number, so that the first identical pair are both designated as 1, the second pair are both designated as 2, there are no families at present with more than two pairs of identical twins.

variable.name: nonprof_0108
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0108 limits distribution to non-profit entities only, zero otherwise

variable.name: nonprof_0407
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0407 limited distribution to non-profit entities only, zero otherwise

variable.name: pedno
variable.description: The family number, present for all subjects found in the pedigree file, and absent for those not included in share_ped_0108_v1.csv

variable.name: release_0108
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0108 allows distribution to either non-profit or private entities, zero otherwise

variable.name: release_0407
variable.description: Equals one if consent_0407 allowed distribution to either non-profit or private entities, zero otherwise
